titleStmt.title: A booke of ayres vvith a triplicitie of musicke, whereof the first part is for the lute or orpharion, and the viole de gambo, and 4. partes to sing, the second part is for 2. trebles to sing to the lute and viole, the third part is for the lute and one voyce, and the viole de gambo. Composed by Iohn Bartlet Gentleman and practitioner in this arte.
titleStmt.author: Bartlet, John, fl. 1606-1610.

titleStmt.title: A booke of ayres vvith a triplicitie of musicke, whereof the first part is for the lute or orpharion, and the viole de gambo, and 4. partes to sing, the second part is for 2. trebles to sing to the lute and viole, the third part is for the lute and one voyce, and the viole de gambo. Composed by Iohn Bartlet Gentleman and practitioner in this arte.
titleStmt.author: Bartlet, John, fl. 1606-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn VVindet, for Iohn Browne and are to bee solde at his shoppe in Saint Dunstones Churchyeard in Fleet street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
